translatedText: Esta regra parece aleatória para muitos estudantes, mas tem uma bela razão para ser verdadeira.
input: This rule seems random to many students, but it has a beautiful reason for being true.

translatedText: Ajude a financiar projetos futuros: https://www.patreon.com/3blue1brown

input: An equally valuable form of support is to simply share some of the videos.
